extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct a thorough impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying any defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA's ICS Security Recommended Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Visit the ICS webpage on cisa.gov/ics to review control systems security recommended practices and other resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Observe and monitor for any suspected malicious activity and follow established internal procedures to report findings to CISA.
